QuestData.Title: A Warrior's End
QuestData.Description:
Hey, $n! You're a $c, right? Maybe you can deal with this... situation.
I was scouting the area with Lindie's device and saw a ghost who was offering power to any "true" warriors.
I know you're still new at this, but why don't you try going over there?
We could use every advantage against these ogres.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the strange ghost at the Darkmaul Bridge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the strange ghost at the Darkmaul Bridge.
